title: How far are we away from fusing our brain with a computer with artificial intelligence? - Quora

response.answer_text: Some people have been able to capture motor control signal from the brain to make a robot arm move. This is hardly “AI Fusion” but it shows an electrical interface to the brain can be done. But there really as os 2019 no AI that is worth connecting to the brain. The current state of AI is much more limited then the general public believes. The popular media has hyped it up to the point where many people think that computers now can actual think, understand and make plans. We are centuries away from that. Today’s AI is just a mindless calculating machine that can match patterns to trigger preprogrammed actions. So there is noAI that you’d want to connect and there will not be anything like that for a LONG time.
People are working on this now. It will be done when it is done. It does not necessarily mean it is a good idea: “You will be assimilated”
